name: 2048: Classic and AR
description:
Merge similar tiles to reach 2048 in this addictive math puzzle.

Manipulate the board in your favor to make 2048. Simply swipe to move tiles and join two touching similar numbers into one.

Plan every swipe carefully – because it will move everything and spawn a new number.

Have fun playing the classic 2048 game or switch to Augmented Reality mode to transform any dusty old carpet, bedroom floor or classroom tile into a real life 2048 board. You can toggle between normal and AR mode anytime without restarting the game.

Keep playing to achieve 4096 and even greater numbers and challenge the limits of how high you can go.

To 2048 and beyond!


2048 AR Features
-Elegant, fast and easy-to-use interface
-Simple yet challenging gameplay
-Undo last 5 moves
-Phone and tablet support
-Game Center Leaderboards
-AR mode
